title: PUC Approves Long-Term Infrastructure Improvement Plan and Distribution System Improvement Charge for PECO Electric (Pennsylvania ...
text: ( Source : Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission ) HARRISBURG - The Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission ( PUC ) today approved the long-term infrastructure improvement plan (LTIIP) and distribution system improvement charge (DSIC) for PECO
